dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2749 IS: To exempt Medicare from any sequestration under Statutory PAYGO that is caused by the One Big Beautiful Bill Act.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Whitehouse introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Budget

form.official-title: To exempt Medicare from any sequestration under Statutory PAYGO that is caused by the One Big Beautiful Bill Act.

section.header: Exemption of Medicare from Statutory PAYGO sequestration caused by the One Big Beautiful Bill Act
section.text: The Medicare programs under title XVIII of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395 et seq.) shall be exempt from reduction under any sequestration order issued on or after the date of enactment of this Act under section 5 of the Statutory Pay-As-You-Go Act of 2010 (2 U.S.C. 934) that is attributable, in whole or in part, to the budgetary effects of the Act entitled An Act to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of H. Con. Res. 14, approved July 4, 2025 (Public Law 119â€“21; 139 Stat. 72) (commonly known as the One Big Beautiful Bill Act).
